form.IN:
Kadar besedo
other
uporabljamo za nedoločnim členom ‘an’, ju pišemo skupaj. Glej
another
.

sense.def:
Ljudje ali stvari, ki so
other
, niso tisti, ki smo jih pravkar omenili ali o katerih smo govorili, temveč neki drugi.

seg.quote: There were some other people in the compartment.
There was no other way to do it.
Results in other countries are impressive.
Some projects are shorter than others.

sense.def:
Potem ko omenimo prvo od dveh stvari, lahko za drugo uporabimo izraz
the other
.

seg.quote: He had his papers in one hand, his hat in the other.
They have two daughters, one a baby, the other a girl of twelve.

sense.def:
The other people or things
so vsi preostali ljudje ali stvari v neki skupini.

seg.quote: I shall wait until the others come back.

sense.def:
Izraz
other people
ali
others
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o ljudeh nasploh, ne vključujemo pa sebe.

seg.quote: One ought not to inflict one's problems on other people.
Working for others can be most fulfilling.

sense.def:
Izraz
other
uporabljamo skupaj z besedami kot
day
ali
week
, kadar želimo reči, da se je nekaj zgodilo pred kratkim, ne povemo pa natančno kdaj.

seg.quote: I saw Davis the other day.

sense.def:
Izraz
other than
uporabimo za nikalnim izrazom, kadar želimo uvesti nekaj, za kar naša prejšnja izjava ne velja ali kar je edino mogoče v danih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: She never discussed it with anyone other than Derek.
There's no choice other than to reopen his case.

sense.def:
Izraz
every other
uporabimo za časovne presledke, v katerih se nekaj dogaja. Na primer, če se nekaj dogaja
every other day
, bi se lahko zgodilo na primer 1., 3., 5. v mesecu.

seg.quote: Their local committees are usually held every other month.

sense.def:
Za izrazi, kot so
some
,
something
ali
somehow
, uporabimo
or other
, če želimo opozoriti, da podatek, ki ga navajamo, ni povsem natančen.

seg.quote: For some reason or other your name was omitted.
Somehow or other, he reached the Alps.

sense.def:
Izraz
one or other
se nanaša na eno ali več stvari ali oseb v skupini, kadar ni pomembno, katero izmed teh stvari ali oseb imamo v mislih ali katero izberemo.

seg.quote: One or other current must be altered.
